title: (x) Lever Sans, Guggenheim - Hoefler Type Foundry {Tiff, Kent}
content:
Hello ...   
   
Does any know where these two fonts can be found, or perhaps suggest fonts that are similar.   
   
Many thanks
author: psargean

comments.content:
You'll see both fonts in the montage at the [Hoefler Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20111217035053/http:/www.typography.com/profile/clients.html) clients page.   
   
I'm not sure that T F-J actually had a hand in either of these, but I don't have my references here to check.   
   
-- K.
There was an article in a recent Metropolis magazine or it might have been online. You could probably do a google search for it.
